operations.notes:
Creates a new Application Data value in the Agilquest system.

Note: The User must be the System Admin to be authorized for this operation.

This operation requires a Application Data

value.

This operation returns a Application Data

value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Reservation Protection Not Found

If the reservation protection identified by sysidReservationProtection is not found, the following exception is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the reservation protection cannot be found.

Invalid Application Name or Login

If the application name or login values are not unique, the following exception is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the application name or login values are not unique.
  • Password Exception if the password provided for the applicaiton login value is not valid.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Updates an existing Application Data value in the Agilquest system.

Note: The User must be the System Admin to be authorized for this operation.

This operation requires a Application Data

value.

This operation returns a Application Data

value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Reservation Protection Not Found

If the reservation protection identified by sysidReservationProtection or the application is not found, the following exception is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the reservation protection or Application cannot be found.

Invalid Application Name or Login

If the application name or login values are not unique, the following exception is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the application name or login values are not unique.
  • Password Exception if the password provided for the applicaiton login value is not valid.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Creates the provided Cost Unit Type value in the system.

NOTE: The user must be the SystemAdmin.

This operation requires a Cost Unit Type argument.

This operation returns a Cost Unit Type value with the required System Identifier (SYSID).

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Duplicate Cost Unit

If a cost unit type with the same name already exists, the following exception is returned:

Duplicate Exception if a cost unit type already exists with that name.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Updates the provided Cost Unit Type value in the system.

NOTE: The user must be the SystemAdmin.

This operation requires a Cost Unit Type argument.

This operation returns a Cost Unit Type value with the required System Identifier (SYSID).

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Cost Unit Type Not Found

If a cost unit type with the same SYSID cannot be found in the system, the following exception is returned:

Not Found Exception if a cost unit type with the same SYSID cannot be found.

Duplicate Cost Unit

If a cost unit type with the same name but different SYSID already exists, the following exception is returned:

Duplicate Exception if a cost unit type already exists with that name.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Returns the Reservation Protection types associated with the User's application. Each Reservation Protection value represents a protection profile indicating what of how reservations can be manipulated within the Application.

Note: The User must be the System Admin to be authorized for this operation.

This operation returns a Reservation Protection Type Wrapper with the following fields:

Name Data Type Description
values List of Reservation Protection values. All Reservation Protection elements for the application associated with the User.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes: Returns the System Display Link values associated with the Application.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to perform the operation or the User Authentication Token is invalid, one of the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes: Creates new System Display Links for the Agilquest.com system. These links may be used in multiple applications and are reseved for Agilquest.com administration only.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to perform the operation or the User Authentication Token is invalid, one of the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes: Update the pre-existing system display links included in this call.

responseMessages.message: OK

Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to perform the operation or the User Authentication Token is invalid, one of the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Returns the current Version information for the Agilquest platform.

This operation returns a Version Data value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.

Version Not Found

If the Version Data cannot be found for the installation, the following exception is returned:

Not Found Exception if the version data cannot be found.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: : Integer System ID of the application
parameters.name: sysidApplication

operations.notes:
Retrieves the Application Data value for the given System ID.

Note: The User must be the System Admin to be authorized for this operation.

This operation returns a Application Data value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Application Not Found

If the Application with a matching System ID is not found, the following exception is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the Application cannot be found.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.
